name: Time Freeze
description:
Stop time whenever you want to!

10 arrows and cannonballs are coming right at you? Enemies and wolfs chasing after you? With a single click of button you can stop them all and freeze time! And when time is stopped, what you do is up to you, catch those arrows and throw them back at your enemies? Attack them and wait to send them to fly? Or simply take a break and plan your next move. What you wish to do is completely up to your own imagination.

Stealth/Combat

Choose your own ways of conquering your enemies, plan your every moves and take out your enemies one by one or simply rush into them and then...Well, then it is up to you.

Ragdoll/Physics system

Push, pull, hit your enemies, or even yourself, launch them into the sky.

Free roam/Exploration

Explore all the secrets, upgrades, weapons and items hidden all over the world, charge up your time energy and make your time stop last longer and longer.

Character Customization

Unlock new ancient souls and costumes for your character and "sneaking suit", they all have unique looks and special abilities that can help you in the journey.
